= Tutorials =

See the [ImportTutorial importing data] tutorial to read in raw data or import from another toolbox.  The [ReportTutorial creating reports] tutorial gives information on creating PDF reports that can be useful in exploratory analysis.

The [UnivariateTutorial univariate statistics] tutorial gives information about creating statistical maps of EEG data, while the [PatclassTutorial pattern classification] tutorial introduces multivariate pattern analysis.
